column4: Fix #991: change default setting for `StreamReadFeature.INCLUDE_SOURCE_IN_LOCATION` to false (#1038)

Fix #1007: add more information on `StreamReadConstraints` violation exception message (#1008)

Try to get Release workflow working wrt SLSA provenance (fix #844) (#989)
Merge test fix from #983 (matching of input/output json)
Test fix: change ref to #730 (issue) from #733 (PR)
Fix #968: prevent some conversion from BigInteger to BigDecimal for perf reasons (#980)
Fix #967 (#973): BigDecimalParser performance for edge cases
Fix #967 (#973): BigDecimalParser performance for edge cases
Curse you Emacs... fix tabs to spaces for github action def
Fix #965 by adding GMM declaration in shade-processed pom.xml (#966)
Fix #959: increase initial max-string-len default from 1M to 5M (#961)
fix javadoc after recent StreamConstraintsException changes (#941)
filter generator: create child object context when writing start object. fixes #890 (#894)
filter generator: create child object context when writing start object. fixes #890 (#891)
Fix #873: change the way number maximum length limits are imposed (#874)
fix bugs where useFastParser is ignored and contentsAsFloat method has indefinite recursion (#867)
Fix class timestamp issue wrt bundle/jar, Reproducible Build

Fix #838: Add Android SDK compatibility check with AnimalSniffer (#841)
Fix previous commit on wrong branch :)
Fix #834 (rare buffer condition for number-parsing, found by oss-fuzz project)
Minor fixes to JsonPointer tests, new implementation (wrt JDK serialization)
Fix #736 (OOME for very deeply nested JsonPointers)
More fixes to rewritten JsonPointer handler (doh! forgot to run ALL tests)
fix for issue found by OSS Fuzz (#810)
fix issue with not failing when numbers have trailing f or d (#790)
Fix #788 (JsonPointer.empty() should not match any index or property)

Some more fixes to non-standard numbers, almost there
Minor fix to leading dot, reader-based parser
Fix parser feature flags defaulting for no-args ctor of "ParserMinimalBase" and "JsonParser"
Fix small javadoc warnings (to get back to 0 warnings)
Minor fixes to issue related to #700 (current name access via getText() should work)
Fix #694 (improvements to handling of Binary content references, location)
Fix to snippet length (for location/exception) changes wrt `String` source
Complete javadoc fixing work: 0 warnings remain in 2.13!
3 minor lgtm.com warning removals (no bugs fixed but lets analyzer reach right result)

Fix test so it works on all OS (#645)
Minor fix to decoding of floating point numbers by DataInput-backed parser
Add a note about backport of #605 fix

Fix NPE in DataFormatMatcher#getMatchedFormatName when no match exists (#591)
Minor fix for custom escape handling wrt "long" (>6 chars) escape handling

Fix #578: non-blocking path still had potential problem, but changed method itself to be safer
Fix #563 (async parser, location for array values)
Fix #561 (second part): improved exception message for unrecognized JSON token
Update release notes wrt #400, after fix, more manual testing
Fix cut\'n  paste problem wrt recycled-buffer-tracking patch

minor javadoc fix for java8 validator
fix a minor problem with async, "yaml comments"

Fix handling of not-a-numbers for non-blocking parser
Fixed non-blocking handling of missing-value/trailing-comma to work same as blocking
further parsing fixes for async, scientific-notation doubles
Fix one remaining prob with leading-zero handling; now passes.
further fixes for async: now apos-quoted names/values, unquoted names work
Fix issues with optional leading-zeroes handling for non-blocking
#330 FilteringParserDelegate - missing end marker handling fixed
Fix issues in utf-8 decoding as per tests
Fix #382 as per Wil\'s suggestion, tests
Fix name escape handling, test. Should now work completely. Next: string values.
Undo fix for #330 due to regression in other areas (need more tests)
Fixes to async parsing of simple tokens (handling of end-of-input)
One minor fix for `isNaN()` impl, must consider infinites too
Minor fix to prevent adding "new" property for `JsonLocation`
Minor fix wrt #17: should not add `abstract` methods without default impl, causes unnecessary compatibility issues

fix a minor regression wrt DataInput-backed parser, eof detection
Add JsonParser feature to ignore a trailing comma (fixes #118, #323)
Fixing ReaderBasedJsonParser too and adding testcase
Fix a small regression with earlier fix, wrt `writeRaw()`

a small set of other FindBugs warnings cleanup; no actual issues found, 97 false warnings remain
Cleaning up a few FindBugs reported minor issues.

further testing improvements, fixes, for DataInput source
fixes to comment handling of DataInput source
